short.ar: وفر الوقت من خلال قراءة ملخص الفيديو الذي تشاهده. يدعم ChatGPT وGemini وClaude AI.
short.am,bn,en,en_AU,es_419,fa,gu,hr,kn,ml,mr,: Save time by reading a summary of the video you are watching. Supports ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude and Mistral AI.
short.bg: Спестете време, като прочетете резюме на видеоклипа, който гледате. Поддържа ChatGPT, Gemini и Claude AI.
short.ca: Estalvieu temps llegint un resum del vídeo que esteu veient. Admet ChatGPT, Gemini i Claude AI.
short.cs: Ušetřete čas čtením shrnutí videa, které sledujete. Podporuje ChatGPT, Gemini a Claude AI.
short.da: Spar tid ved at læse et resumé af den video, du ser. Understøtter ChatGPT, Gemini og Claude AI.
short.de: Sparen Sie Zeit, indem Sie eine Zusammenfassung des Videos lesen, das Sie gerade ansehen. Unterstützt ChatGPT, Gemini und Claude AI.
short.el: Εξοικονομήστε χρόνο διαβάζοντας μια περίληψη του βίντεο που παρακολουθείτε. Υποστηρίζει ChatGPT, Gemini και Claude AI.
short.en_GB,en_US: Save time by reading a summary of the video you are watching. Supports ChatGPT, Gemini and Claude AI.
short.es: Ahorra tiempo leyendo un resumen del vídeo que estás viendo. Admite ChatGPT, Gemini y Claude AI.
short.et: Säästke aega, lugedes vaadatava video kokkuvõtet. Toetab ChatGPT, Gemini ja Claude AI.
short.fi: Säästä aikaa lukemalla yhteenveto katsomastasi videosta. Tukee ChatGPT:tä, Geminiä ja Claude AI:tä.
short.fil: Makatipid ng oras sa pamamagitan ng pagbabasa ng buod ng video na iyong pinapanood. Sinusuportahan ang ChatGPT, Gemini at Claude AI.
short.fr: Gagnez du temps en lisant un résumé de la vidéo que vous regardez. Prend en charge ChatGPT, Gemini et Claude AI.
short.he: חסוך זמן על ידי קריאת תקציר של הסרטון שאתה צופה בו. תומך ב-ChatGPT, Gemini וקלוד AI.
short.hi: आप जो वीडियो देख रहे हैं उसका सारांश पढ़कर समय बचाएँ। ChatGPT, Gemini और Claude AI का समर्थन करता है।
short.hu: Időt takaríthat meg, ha elolvassa az éppen nézett videó összefoglalóját. Támogatja a ChatGPT-t, a Geminit és a Claude AI-t.
short.id: Hemat waktu dengan membaca ringkasan video yang Anda tonton. Mendukung ChatGPT, Gemini dan Claude AI.
short.it: Risparmia tempo leggendo un riepilogo del video che stai guardando. Supporta ChatGPT, Gemini e Claude AI.
short.ja: 視聴中のビデオの要約を読んで時間を節約します。ChatGPT、Gemini、Claude AI をサポートします。
short.ko: 시청 중인 동영상의 요약을 읽어 시간을 절약하세요. ChatGPT, Gemini 및 Claude AI를 지원합니다.
short.lt: Sutaupykite laiko skaitydami žiūrimo vaizdo įrašo santrauką. Palaiko ChatGPT, Gemini ir Claude AI.
short.lv: Ietaupiet laiku, izlasot skatītā videoklipa kopsavilkumu. Atbalsta ChatGPT, Gemini un Claude AI.
short.ms: Jimat masa dengan membaca ringkasan video yang sedang anda tonton. Menyokong ChatGPT, Gemini dan Claude AI.
short.nl: Bespaar tijd door een samenvatting te lezen van de video die u bekijkt. Ondersteunt ChatGPT, Gemini en Claude AI.
short.no: Spar tid ved å lese et sammendrag av videoen du ser på. Støtter ChatGPT, Gemini og Claude AI.
short.pl: Oszczędzaj czas, czytając podsumowanie oglądanego filmu. Obsługuje ChatGPT, Gemini i Claude AI.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Economize tempo lendo um resumo do vídeo que você está assistindo. Suporta ChatGPT, Gemini e Claude AI.
short.ro: Economisiți timp citind un rezumat al videoclipului pe care îl vizionați. Suportă ChatGPT, Gemini și Claude AI.
short.ru: Сэкономьте время, прочитав краткое содержание просматриваемого видео. Поддерживает ChatGPT, Gemini и Claude AI.
short.sk: Ušetrite čas čítaním súhrnu videa, ktoré pozeráte. Podporuje ChatGPT, Gemini a Claude AI.
short.sl: Prihranite čas tako, da preberete povzetek videa, ki ga gledate. Podpira ChatGPT, Gemini in Claude AI.
short.sr: Уштедите време читањем резимеа видеа који гледате. Подржава ЦхатГПТ, Гемини и Цлауде АИ.
short.sv: Spara tid genom att läsa en sammanfattning av videon du tittar på. Stöder ChatGPT, Gemini och Claude AI.
short.th: ประหยัดเวลาด้วยการอ่านบทสรุปของวิดีโอที่คุณกำลังดู รองรับ ChatGPT, Gemini และ Claude AI
short.tr: İzlediğiniz videonun özetini okuyarak zaman kazanın. ChatGPT, Gemini ve Claude AI'yi destekler.
short.uk: Заощаджуйте час, читаючи короткий зміст відео, яке ви переглядаєте. Підтримує ChatGPT, Gemini та Claude AI.
short.vi: Tiết kiệm thời gian bằng cách đọc tóm tắt video bạn đang xem. Hỗ trợ ChatGPT, Gemini và Claude AI.
short.zh_CN: 通过阅读您正在观看的视频的摘要来节省时间。支持 ChatGPT、Gemini 和 Claude AI。
short.zh_TW: 透過閱讀您正在觀看的影片的摘要來節省時間。支援 ChatGPT、Gemini 和 Claude AI。

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,es,et,f:
Transform the way you consume digital content with YouTube Summary, your go-to Chrome Extension for quickly summarizing YouTube videos with the intelligence of ChatGPT (OpenAI), Gemini (Google), or Claude (Anthropic). This free tool is designed to enhance your learning and save precious time. Also supports summarizing web articles, and PDFs. 

DISCOVER THE ADVANTAGES:
* Time-Saving: Skip lengthy videos and get straight to the core ideas.
* Boost Productivity: Absorb vital information swiftly, freeing up time for other activities.
* Enhanced Learning: Ideal for educational purposes, offering succinct summaries and transcripts for efficient study and research.

SEAMLESS USAGE:
* Easy Integration: Install the extension, open your desired YouTube video, and click the YouTube Summary icon for instant summarization.
* Interactive Summaries: View video summaries with or without timestamps and easily jump to specific sections.
* Transcript Access: Quickly copy video transcripts with a simple click.

PERSONALIZATION OPTIONS:
* Customizable Prompt: Customize the prompt you want to use to summarize.
* Multilingual Capability: Summarizes content in various languages, perfect for a global audience.
* Language Selection for Transcripts: Choose your desired language for transcripts.

WIDELY APPLICABLE:
* Educational Enhancement: An invaluable tool for students and educators alike.
* Multi-language Support: Effective for videos in multiple languages, catering to an international user base.

Join users who are already reaping the benefits of smarter, faster learning with YouTube Summary. For detailed information, visit our website at https://dictanote.co/youtube-summary/
